column6: In the wake of AVENGERS & X-MEN: AXIS, Magneto has taken a group of wayward mutants into his care on the abandoned island of Genosha. But now someone is hunting and killing those mutants one by one, right under his nose. And that someone happens to be the one man Magneto fears most...
column8: | writer:Cullen Bunn | artist:Gabriel Hernandez Walta | penciller (cover):David Yardin
